price: sesungguhnya Kami menurunkannya pada suatu malam yang diberkahi 1370 dan sesungguhnya Kami-lah yang memberi peringatan.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
footnotes: 1370.  Malam yang diberkahi ialah malam Al-Qur`ān pertama kali diturunkan.  Di Indonesia, umumnya dianggap jatuh pada tanggal 17 Ramadan.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu fī laylatin mubārakatin innā kunnā mundhirīna
